FuncDef: This command creates a route policy AS path regular expression statement to use in route policy entries.

ParaDef.Info: The AS path regular expression. Allowed values are any string up to 256 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes. Policy parameters must start and end with at-signs (@); for example, "@variable@".
The AS path expressed as an empty regular expression string.
